prompt: One concept on the Internet is “trolling.” Trolling is when someone makes a mean, controversial, or obnoxious statement to cause angry reactions from others. Which of the following might be a solution to reduce trolling on a social website?
feedback: One factor that makes trolling easier is anonymity. Because Internet comments are often anonymous, people can post comments that are only meant to cause angry reactions without consequences. Eliminating the ability to post anonymously on a website might be a solution to reduce trolling, because people can see who is making the offensive comment. It might also have other consequences, though, like making people more reluctant to talk about controversial or difficult issues.
